盲唖学校: (もうあがっこう) - school for the blind and dumb
盲執: (もうしゅう) - deep-rooted delusion; firm conviction (based on incorrect beliefs)
盲学校: (もうがっこう) - school for the blind
盲打ち: (めくらうち) - punching blindly; random firing
盲斑: (もうはん) - blind spot (on the retina)
盲暦: (めくらごよみ) - picture calendar for illiterates
盲滅法: (めくらめっぽう) - reckless; blind; without knowing; at random
盲目的に: (もうもくてきに) - blindly (trusting someone, etc.)
盲窓: (めくらまど) - false window; blind window
盲管銃創: (もうかんじゅうそう) - lodged-bullet wound
盲腸: (もうちょう) - appendix; {anat} cecum/caecum/blind gut; appendicitis
盲腸炎手術: (もうちょうえんしゅじゅつ) - appendectomy; appendicectomy; appendisectomy
盲蛇: (メクラヘビ) - blind snake (esp. the Brahminy blind snake, Ramphotyphlops braminus)/worm snake; fools rush in
盲蛇に怖じず: (めくらへびにおじず) - fools rush in where angels fear to tread
盲蜘蛛: (めくらぐも) - harvestman; daddy longlegs (arachnid of order Opiliones)
盲貫銃創: (もうかんじゅうそう) - lodged-bullet wound
盲長屋: (めくらながや) - tenement house with no windows
盲鰻: (メクラウナギ) - hagfish (esp. the species Myxine garmani from Japan)
直ぐ: (すぐ) - immediately/at once/directly; soon/before long/shortly; easily/without difficulty; right (near)/nearby/just (handy)
直す: (なおす) - (usu. 治す) to cure/to heal; (usu. 直す) to fix/to correct/to repair; (usu. 直す) to do over again (after -masu base of verb); (usu. 直す) to replace/to put back as it was; (usu. 直す) to convert (into a different state)/to transform
直ちに: (ただちに) - at once; immediately; directly; in person; automatically
直と: (ひたと) - close to; directly (e.g. staring); suddenly (e.g. stopping)
直ばき: (じかばき) - wearing next to the skin (e.g. shoes without socks, trousers without underwear)
直る: (なおる) - (esp. 治る) to be cured/to get well/to be healed; (esp. 直る) to get mended/to be repaired/to be fixed
直リン: (じかリン) - direct link; direct linking
直上: (ちょくじょう) - above; going steadily upward
直下: (ちょっか) - directly under; falling perpendicularly
直下型地震: (ちょっかがたじしん) - near-field earthquake; local earthquake, esp. with a shallow focus directly under a populated area
直並列変換器: (ちょくへいれつへんかんき) - staticizer; serial-parallel converter
直交化平面波: (ちょっこうかへいめんは) - orthogonalized plane wave; OPW
直交周波数多重: (ちょっこうしゅうはすうたじゅう) - OFDM; orthogonal frequency division multiplexing
直交周波数多重変調: (ちょっこうしゅうはすうたじゅうへんちょう) - orthogonal frequency division multiplexing
直交座標: (ちょっこうざひょう) - Cartesian coordinates; rectangular coordinates
直交性: (ちょっこうせい) - orthogonal; quadrature component
直交振幅変調: (ちょっこうしんぷくへんちょう) - Quadrature Amplitude Modulation; QAM
直交系列: (ちょっこうけいれつ) - orthogonal sequences
直人: (ただひと) - ordinary person; untitled individual
直伝: (じきでん) - direct transmission (of mysteries or skill); initiation
直円柱: (ちょくえんちゅう) - right cylinder
直円錐: (ちょくえんすい) - a right circular cone
直出: (ちょくしゅつ) - shooting straight out; growing straight down
直列データ回線: (ちょくれつデータかいせん) - tandem data circuit
直列伝送: (ちょくれつでんそう) - serial transmission
直列加算: (ちょくれつかさん) - serial addition
直列加算器: (ちょくれつかさんき) - serial adder
直前指定要素: (ちょくぜんしていようそ) - previous specified element
直参: (じきさん) - immediate follower (of the shogun)
直収: (ちょくしゅう) - dedicated line (e.g. phone service)
直取引: (じきとりひき) - spot transaction; cash transaction
直叙: (ちょくじょ) - honestly describing (i.e. without sentiment or conjecture)
直叩き: (じかたたき) - hitting the hardware directly
直向きに聞く: (ひたむきにきく) - to listen intently
直和集合: (ちょくわしゅうごう) - direct sum
